CustomField.description: Indicates whether the request should be processed through the use of Queuable Apex (single transaction per request) or Batch Apex (processed in batches of 25 requests). Defaults to "Queuable" if not explicitly set.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the request should be processed through the use of Queuable Apex (single transaction per request) or Batch Apex (processed in batches of 25 requests). Defaults to "Queuable" if not explicitly set.
CustomField.label: Apex Job Type
